p: HIV-1 subtype was inferred from the consensus evolutionary tree ( S1 Fig). The subtype distribution was heterogeneous with subtype A predominating (n = 50, 57.5%) ( Fig 2). Other HIV-1 variants included C (n = 6, 6.9%), D (n = 19, 21.8%), G (n = 2, 2.3%), and Circulating Recombinant Forms (CRFs: n = 10, 11.5%) that comprised AD (n = 8, 9.2%) and A2D (n = 2, 2.3%).
